title: Trine Classic Collection (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Grab the Trine series for free with the Trine Classic Collection on the Epic Games Store! It includes all four games: Trine Enchanted Edition, Trine 2: Complete Story, Trine 3: Artifacts of Power, and Trine 4: Definitive Edition. Only 24 hours left, don’t miss it!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Epic Games Store Holiday Giveaway
description: Epic Games Store is getting into the holiday spirit with free in-game goodies! Grab bundles, gift packs and bonuses for Fortnite, Fall Guys, Rocket League, Asphalt Legends, Infinity Nikki and more!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Scroll down and select your favorite giveaway.
3. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
4. Click the button to add the add-on to your library.

title: Dominion Synergy Gift Pack Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Dominion Synergy Gift Pack Key and unlock a Pearl Magnum Gunskin plus 1-month Ultimate Battle Pass.
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
3. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: DungeonLoot: Open Beta Has Arrived!
description: The GamerPower team is on a quest to bring more loot to gamers, so we created DungeonLoot. The idea is something like Amazon Prime Gaming, but completely free. No subscriptions or costs, just a place where you can claim gaming loot anytime. Our goal? To make DungeonLoot the ultimate place for gaming giveaways.
instructions: 1. Click the button to visit DungeonLoot. 2. Simply create an account. 3. Select your favorite giveaway and grab the loot. It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS
